<!-- source-hash: 06dbb63d69b1a5c3f8c5ed560635030d -->
Maps between internal Event domain objects and external REST API DTOs for event-related endpoints. Handles conversion of events, filter options, and paginated query results.

## Key Components

- **toEventResponse()** - Converts single Event entity to EventResponse DTO
- **toEventResponseList()** - Converts list of Event entities to EventResponse DTOs
- **toEventFilterResponse()** - Maps EventFilters to EventFilterResponse DTO
- **toEventsResponse()** - Converts paginated query results to EventsResponse with pagination info
- **toEventFilterOptions()** - Maps external filter criteria to internal filter options
- **Extends BaseRestMapper** - Inherits common mapping utilities like `toRestPageInfo()`

## Usage Example

```java
@RestController
public class EventController {
    
    @Autowired
    private EventMapper eventMapper;
    
    @Autowired
    private EventService eventService;
    
    @GetMapping("/events/{id}")
    public EventResponse getEvent(@PathVariable String id) {
        Event event = eventService.findById(id);
        return eventMapper.toEventResponse(event);
    }
    
    @PostMapping("/events/search")
    public EventsResponse searchEvents(@RequestBody EventFilterCriteria criteria) {
        EventFilterOptions options = eventMapper.toEventFilterOptions(criteria);
        GenericQueryResult<Event> results = eventService.search(options);
        return eventMapper.toEventsResponse(results);
    }
}
```

The mapper ensures clean separation between internal domain models and external API contracts, handling null safety and leveraging the builder pattern for immutable DTO construction.
